title: The Injury
description: Michael's "injury" from a George Foreman Grill distracts the staff from Dwight, the one with the real injury.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: ...Lord of the Rings trilogy, if you see it back to back, it's really long.  But it's good.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [off camera] Yeah, that's right.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Dunder Mifflin, this is Pam.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Pam! It's Michael.  Help me!  I need help right now.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Michael, what's wrong?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm hurt, I have hurt myself.  Oh my God!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Ok, wait wait wait wait...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ungh, this is not looking good Pam!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Michael, do you need me to call an ambulance?!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, I want you to pick me up.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Ok...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What's going on?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Wait a second, I thought you said that you were hurt.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I am hurt. I hurt my foot.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm sorry? Pam.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [exasperated]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What is going on?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I want to come to work.  But I need you to come and pick me up. [Jim lunges across Pam's desk and puts Michael on speakerphone]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: OH GOD!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Hey, whoa, Michael...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh God!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: It's, okay, it's Jim.  Just say again, uh, really loudly what happened.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: OK, buhhhh, I burned my foot very badly on my Foreman Grill and I now need someone to come and bring me into work.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You burned your foot on a Foreman Grill?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I enjoy having breakfast in bed.  I like waking up to the smell of bacon, sue me.  And since I don't have a butler, I have to do it myself.  So, most nights before I go to bed, I will lay six strips of bacon out on my George Foreman Grill.  Then I go to sleep.  When I wake up, I plug in the grill, I go back to sleep again.  Then I wake up to the smell of crackling bacon.  It is delicious, it's good for me.  It's the perfect way to start the day.  Today I got up, I stepped onto the grill and it clamped down on my foot... that's it.  I don't see what's so hard to believe about that.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Pam, could you come get me?!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Uh, I have to stay here and answer the phone.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ok, could someone come and get me please, Ryan?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Michael, you should stay home and rest.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: There's no toilet paper here.  Could Ryan... tell Ryan to bring toilet paper.  Could you tell 'em that?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Can you hop?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I tried hopping, Kevin, and I bumped my elbow against the wall and now my elbow has a protruberance.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [panicked] No one wants to pick me up!?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [silence, Dwight enters the office] What is going on? What is going on?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Michael, is, um, sick and he wants one of us to rescue him.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm not sick! I'm burned!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'm coming Michael!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'm gonna save you!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Don't... is that Dwight?  I do not want Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Hold on Michael! I am coming! Wait there!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I don't want Dwight!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Michael, why don't you call your girlfriend?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I don't have a girlfriend.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: But you said that you went out with her this weekend.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: It was all made up.  Just someone come, ok?  Anyone.  Anyone but Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [sounds of a car crash] What was that...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: What was that?! [everyone runs to Michael's office window]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Ohhhhhh!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: He hit the pole!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: It's broken right, he can't...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh my gosh.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh Dwight, Dwight, [Dwight pukes on his back windshield]  Ohhhhhh!

quotes.speaker: {jim} and {pam}
quotes.text: Oh my God!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Is he ok?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: He's still driving... Dwight, you forgot your bumper!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Hellooo? ... Please don't send Dwight!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Morning everyone.  Don't freak out. I forbid anybody to freak out.  Clearly, I have had a very serious accident, but I will recover, God willing.  I just want to be treated normally today.  Normal would actually be good, considering the trauma that I've been through.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: You missed two big conference calls today, one with corporate.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did you explain why?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No, I didn't mention that you cooked your foot.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Burned my foot, Pam.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Please stop popping my cast.  Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: So, where are you shipping your foot?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ha ha ha.  So where are you shipping...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Your foot?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Thank you.  Pam, messages please?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: You didn't have any.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Really, well, it, uh, seemed very important to you earlier that you needed to stay and...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: And do my job?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, your job is being my friend, Pam.  OW! God!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [holding mini-fan]  It slipped.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Sorry.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: It's just that before, you said that you didn't want any special treatment.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I don't want any special treatment, Pam. I just want you to treat me like you would some family member who's undergone some sort of serious physical trauma.  I don't think that's too much to ask.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Do you want some aspirin, because you seem a little fussy.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, I don't want some aspirin, yeah I'm a little fussy.  Aspirin's not gonna do a damn thing.  I'm sitting here with a bloody stump of a foot.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Hey, Pam, I'm assistant regional manager, and I can take care of him. Part of my duties are to.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What?  Part of your duties are to what?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You just said "part of your duties are to" something.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, I didn't.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes, you did.  What is wrong with you?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What is wrong with you?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Where is my cornbread?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Here you go.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Thank you.  Did you get all dark meat like I like?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Yes. I ordered three full rotisserie chickens worth of all dark meat.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Where are the yams?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: They were out of yams.  I got you creamed spinach.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did you go to the one in Stroudsburg?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: And they had no yams?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: They had no yams.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: How strange.  Because they always have yams.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Aw, man, is that a Prism Duro-Sport?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: You've seen one of these?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah, they're like an i-Pod only they're better 'cause they're chunkier and more solid.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Roy gave it to me for Christmas.  I'm trying to figure out how to put songs on it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh, no no no.  Don't go there.  I know this Russian website where you can download songs for two cents a piece.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Really?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah, I'll write down the address for you.  Only, the only thing is, is that all the songs are in Russian. ... Kidding!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh! Ha, haha.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Why would they all be...?  Ok, see you later, Pan.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Pan?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Pam... PAAAM!?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh, God.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [phone rings] What.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Come here please.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Tell me before I come there.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I want you to rub butter on my foot.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Pam, please?  I have Country Crock.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Uh, ow.  Ryan! ... Ryaaaaan ... RYYYYAN!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: These covers are totally indestructible.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Really?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah. Throw it.  I promise it won't break.  Chuck it. [Pam throws her mp3 player]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh no, it's broken.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: What?!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, it's fine.  I told you it wouldn't break.  You could throw it all day long.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: That is so cool.  Thanks Dwight!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yep.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: So, I guess Pam and Dwight are friends now.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh God no, Dwight isn't my friend... Oh my God!  Dwight's kind of my friend!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, nope, no one is helping me out at all Mom.  No, I'm not gonna call Jan.  She'd just worry... drive down here and make a big thing... Who told you that?  No, it was mutual.  What is Pam doing chatting with you?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Huh. Do you like candy?

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: It's alright.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Cause you're sweeter than candy.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: What is wrong with you? [Dwight pats Angela on the rear and runs away laughing]

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Hey!

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Wow, you just dive right into it.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: You know, around age twelve, I just started goin' for it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [loud noise in bathroom] No! Guh! OW! Awww, help, help me!

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: What, what happened?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I fell off the toilet.  I'm caught between the toilet and the wall.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: What do you need?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ugh, not you.  Someone else.  Get Pam.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: I don't think Pam's gonna want to come into the men's room.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Get Ryan.  He needs to lift me. [Ryan shakes his head] and he needs to clean me up a little bit.  Bring a wet towel.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Ryan, is, uh, dead.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, he's not.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Dead.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I just saw him.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: No.  Can't, can't you just get up yourself?  I... You only grilled your foot.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ugh, forget it.  I'll just get up myself.  No!  Uh, aaaahhh!  Ah!  Oh God!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Do you think Dwight's bein' a little weird today?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No, he's actually been really nice and helpful.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: And that isn't weird?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Wow...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Can I have everyone's attention please?  Phyllis, Oscar, Ryan, who's supposed to be dead, can I ask you all a question?  Do you all know what it's like to be disabled?  Oscar?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Um, I had scoliosis as a girl.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, never heard of it.  No, a real disability, not a woman's trouble.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: When I was a teenager, I was in an iron lung.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Wuh, how, how old are you? Look, the point is, I am the only one here who has a legitimate disability, although I'm sure Stanley has had his fair share of obstacles.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: I'm not disabled and neither are you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ok, [lifts up cooked foot] what does this look like to you Stanley?!

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Mailboxes, Etc.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Shuuut it, ok, well, well you know what, disabilities are not things to be laughed at or laughed about.  You people are jerks.  Imagine if you had left Stevie Wonder on the floor of that bathroom instead of me.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Oh, we wouldn't.  We love Stevie Wonder.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [sigh] I burned my foot!!!  Ok, twenty minutes, conference room, everybody's in there!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [looking up at Creed] Dad?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: While we are waiting for our special guest to arrive, I wanted you all to take a look at a few of the many, many disabled icons who have contributed so much to our society.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Quick question: uh, why is Tom Hanks on the wall?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Twice.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Good question.  Forrest Gump: mentally challenged, Philadelphia [points to a picture from Big]:

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I want to clamp Michael's face in a George Foreman grill.

quotes.speaker: Billy Merchant
quotes.text: So, there are just a couple things I want to remind everybody of...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ok...

quotes.speaker: Billy Merchant
quotes.text: First is parking.  You can't block the freight entrance with your car, even if your blinkers are on.  Does anybody have any questions? [to Dwight, whose arms is raised]  Yes. Yeah? yes...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Dwight, you have your hand up.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ignore him.  You know what?  We're not that different, you and I.  When I clamped my foot into a non-stick...

quotes.speaker: Billy Merchant
quotes.text: You know what Michael?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeah...

quotes.speaker: Billy Merchant
quotes.text: Let me stop you right there.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ok.

quotes.speaker: Billy Merchant
quotes.text: And leave.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did you see Born on the Fourth of July?  I was under the impression that Billy would be more like that guy.

quotes.speaker: Billy Merchant
quotes.text: What's wrong with that guy?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You mean today?  He stepped on a George Foremen grill and he burned his foot.

quotes.speaker: Billy Merchant
quotes.text: No, not Michael.  The moon-faced kid who crashed into the pole.  He looks like he has a concussion.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [popping his bubble wrap cast] Hey!

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: I found the pudding cups you wanted in a gas station in Carbondale!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You did it!  Look at you, and with the plate and the napkin.  Very nice.  Thank you, Ryan.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: You are very welcome.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did you get the yams?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: No, the gas station in Carbondale did not have fresh yams!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [sigh] Ok, I'll just have the pudding.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: You sure?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeh.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Ok.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You know what?  I feel better.  Ryan brought me some chocolate pudding and his kindness healed my foot.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeah, baby, I am feelin' better.  My body's literally healing itself.  It is amazing what the human body is capable of when you have a powerful brain.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: I ground up four extra-strength aspirin and put them in Michael's pudding.  I do the same thing with my dog to get him to take his heartworm medicine.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Uh, finally feel the blood coursing through my foot veins.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [hits his head on his desk]  Uh, ugh, ohhhh...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Uh, ok, I think we need to take him to the hospital because I'm pretty sure he has a concussion.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh, now you feel some compassion for him.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: He needs to go right now, and you're his emergency contact.  I think that you should go with him.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Why don't you go with him?

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: I, barely know him...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I want Michael to take me...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I can't take you, I don't have my car and yours is all vomity.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: You can take my van!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh, ok, that's, great.  No, I can't drive.  Jim why don't you drive.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Fine.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: We'll go.  I'm still recovering. So let's just, Ryan, could you get my coat please.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Slowly, slowly.  Let's just get to the elevator.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Choo choo choo choo choo choo...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What are you doing?  What, stop...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Vietnam sounds.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [Dwight falls onto the couch] Stop, stop, stop, stop.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Tired... [Jim grabs spray bottle from planter]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You can't lay down.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Want to take a rake... .

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Wake up. [sprays Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ahh!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Dwight, here, let me help you Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm just gonna get...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ok, Pam, thanks.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Get up, get up.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You're the best.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Just keep him awake.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: It smells like chicken soup.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I know.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I have to go to the hospital.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I know.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Where we going?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I just want to say goodbye ok?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'll be back, I mean...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yes, I know, but it's gonna be different.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Why?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: It's just hard to explain.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Aw, Pam, you're adorable [taps her nose]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh my goodness!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [giggles]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Come here.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh, huggy hugs.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Shotgun!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You don't think you should sit in the back with Dwight?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: The rules of shotgun are very simple and very clear.  The first person to shout "shotgun" when you're within the sight of the car gets the front seat.  That's how  the game's played.  There are no exceptions for someone with a concussion.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh, God, a mini-van.  What is Meredith's problem?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Well, I think she has a kid.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well, yeah she has one kid, no husband.  She's not gonna find one driving this thing around.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Where are we going?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Come on, get inside.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Where are we going?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: We're going to Chuck E. Cheese.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Chuck E. Cheese?  Oh, God, I'm so sick of Chuck E. Cheese.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: We're going to the hospital, Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I know, just sayin'.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Dwight, what are you drinking?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I found it under the seat.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh my God, Dwight, put that down.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'm thirsty.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Give the bottle to Michael [sprays Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Give the bottle to Michael!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'm thirsty!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Give it to me.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Dwight... [to Jim] You just keep your eyes on the road. [to Dwight]  Give me the bottle or you're fired.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You can't fire me, I don't work in this van!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Give it to me Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No. [takes a drink]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Give me the bottle!!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [to Michael] Will you stop?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Gimme the bottle, Dwight!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Michael stop.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [drinks] Mmmmm...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Just give it!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Michael stop. [sprays Michael, then Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Stop, stop it! Stop spraying! [Dwight whines] Gimme the bottle!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Stop [sprays Michael]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: My eyes!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Stop spraying me!  Gimme the bottle!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: My eyes!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Dwight, what is your middle name.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Danger.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [sigh] Something with a "K".

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: It's Kurt.  Wow, I am so sad that I know that.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What do I write under "reason for visit"?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Concussion. [Michael scribbles something out] What did you write?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Nothing.  I wrote "bringing someone to the hospital".

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: So you thought they meant your reason for coming to the hospital.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No... you know what Jim, this isn't about me anymore.  I made a miraculous recovery, which is more than I can say for him. [Dwight falls towards Jim]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Come on Dwight. [sprays Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Hi Michael!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Hi Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ahhh.  Mweehaa

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Doctor, what is more serious, a head injury or a foot injury?

quotes.speaker: Doctor
quotes.text: A head injury.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well, you don't have all the information. The foot as been fairly severely burned and healed quickly, very quickly, actually like suspiciously quickly.

quotes.speaker: Doctor
quotes.text: [to Dwight] So, I'm ordering a CAT scan.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What is that?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Look since you have the machine up and running, can I just stick my foot, we take a look?

quotes.speaker: Doctor
quotes.text: Well, for a burn, you really just need to look at the outside of the foot.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ok, what kinda machine is that?

quotes.speaker: Doctor
quotes.text: Does the skin look red and swollen?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: That's what she said.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: That's my joke, damnit Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Lab Tech
quotes.text: Ok, no electronics past this point.  Camera, sound equipment...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: It's ok, they're with me.

quotes.speaker: Lab Tech
quotes.text: No metal of any kind.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Alright, well, I guess this is where we leave you off.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I don't want to do this.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Uh, well you should of thought of before you crashed your head on your way to pick me up.  We'll, see you when you get out.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Fine. Fine.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Dunder Mifflin, this is Pam.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Dunder Mifflin, this is Jim.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh my God, what is going on, is Dwight ok?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Uh hmm, he should be fine, but, uh, they brought him in for a CAT scan.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I can't believe he's getting a CAT scan.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Michael went in there with him too.  It's pretty sweet.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Really? Michael went in with him?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Uh huh.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Wow.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: But they shouldn't be much longer now, so we'll be back soon.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Ok, that's uh, good news [Pam sees Angela eavesdropping] Uh, yeah, no I'll let you go.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Ok.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Ok. Bye.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Bye.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Hey, Oscar?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: What's up, Pam?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I just wanted to let you that Dwight's gonna be ok.  The doctor said there's a really simple treatment for a concussion, so he'll probably even be back at work tomorrow.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Ok...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I just, uh, thought you'd want to know that.

quotes.speaker: Lab Tech
quotes.text: Ok Mr. Schrute, inhale with me on three.  One, two, uh Sir? [Michael tries to put his leg in the scanner] Stop that. Stop. Stop that.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [Jim popping Michael's bubble wrap cast] You should put butter on it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Uh, that's what she said.  See, haven't lost my sense of humor.  No, no need, it was a non-stick grill.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I've had a Foreman grill for about six years, I've done about 85% of my cooking on it, but I've never burnt myself, probably because I don't use it as a pillow.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I always keep a stash of bubble wrap at my house.  Some days, hectic, tiring days, I just like to go home and zone out and click on the tube and pop a few.  Very soothing.  [to the interviewer] Want to try?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You know, that's probably not gonna last too long, you should go to a hospital and get a real cast.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Right, I'm gonna spend the day in the hospital, bujehh.  Bureaucracy and germs.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: And doctors.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes, so, no thank you.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Pssht.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Constructing a home-made cast?  Genius.  Filled with foresight.  Like in the pioneer times, if you lost a leg, they would then use the bone of the leg for a cane.  They wasted nothing.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Wow, I don't want to hear... you talk.  Pam, could I have a word with you in my office?  [stumbling] Oh, oh, oh.  Alright.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: My assignment is to make a temporary disabled parking permit for Michael Scott.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Ooo! Who made popcorn? [Michael rubbing butter on his foot]

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: [on speakerphone] Well you know, frankly a lot of us have been saying this for a long time.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeah, I've been sayin that.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Yeah, and I, uh, I think that the very fact that we're including it in our agenda frankly, is a big step forward.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did you know I used to be in HR?

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: I'm sorry?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I used to be in HR.  I was a Hell raiser.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Uh, ok.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Right? [laughs]

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Uh, great.  Why don't we move on?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Alright. Movin' on.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Great.  Because you that I think the very fact that [Michael mutes the call]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ry-an.  You're here.  Whatcha got, whatcha got?  Alright, Panic Room, Maverick, Nell, Sommersby, The Accused.  Where's Little Man Tate?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: They were out.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh come on.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: At three different places.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh man.  It's not a Jodie Foster afternoon without Little Man Tate, buddy.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Mmm, I'm telling you the best cure in the world is comfort food.  You know how they say "stuff a cold"?  Well I don't care you've got, the flu, Lyme disease, emphysema, you eat an entire dark meat chicken, you can walk on the moon.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Look, I feel fine.  As a volunteer sheriff's deputy I have been trained to notice all the signs of a concussion.  One of them is slurred speech, ok?  Number three, shortness of breath.  There are four things you have to remember.  One:

quotes.speaker: Doctor
quotes.text: We need to get your friend into the CT machine.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Into a machine?!  Ok. Uh, that's bad, will you stay with me?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ok, will you please call my cousin Mose?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, I'm not calling your weirdo cousin.  Twenty-seven years old, never left the beet farm.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh God.  Oh God.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Guh-od.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh God.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ok, I'll stand near you.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Next to me?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Next-ish.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Spanish language telenovela dialogue from the waiting room T.V.]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm gonna pull the car around.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Shh shh shh shh.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Do you speak Spanish?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No. Do you?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: No, I don't.
